App Configuration

Color and shape configuration used in FunctionTestApp. See Tkinter Colors

Active colors: Used when mouse is hovered over element. Message colors: Used for message output by the process message display.

Border colors of buttons are not customizable.

app_config.dark_theme = False

Option for using a dark theme for the app.

app_config.obs_color = 'orange'

obstacle color

app_config.obs_active_color = 'orange2'

obstacle active color

app_config.transition_color = 'black'

transition color

app_config.transition_active_color = 'grey20'

transition active color

app_config.start_color = 'green'

start color

app_config.start_active_color = 'green2'

start active color

app_config.goal_color = 'red2'

goal color

app_config.goal_active_color = 'orange red'

goal active color

app_config.pipe_color = 'blue'

straight pipe color

app_config.pipe_active_color = 'dodger blue'

straight pipe active color

app_config.fit_color = 'saddle brown'

fiting color

app_config.fit_active_color = 'salmon3'

fitting active color

app_config.att_color = 'medium violet red'

attachment color

app_config.att_active_color = 'magenta'

attachment active color n

app_config.button_width = 6

Width of the grid buttons.

app_config.button_height = 10

Height of the grid buttons.

app_config.font = ('Tahoma', 6)

Tuple containing str of font art and int of font size.

app_config.message_deviated_assembly_color = 'yellow2'

message color on deviated assembly

app_config.message_conformal_assembly_color = 'green2'

message color on conformal assembly

app_config.message_error_color = 'red3'

message color on error

app_config.message_detour_event_color = 'maroon1'

message color on detour event

app_config.message_construction_complete_color = 'gold'

message color on completion

app_config.message_action_undone_color = 'brown1'

message color on undo action

app_config.configure_style(style)

Sets the style for the process visualization and interface. If ttkbootstrap theme is not used the look of the buttons will depend on the type and version of operating system used!

Parameters

style¶ (ttk.Style) – Tkinter Style object.
